name: Scooter Bike Stunt Race
description:
Download now for free !!!

Get ready for the scooter experience of your life with snow scooter rider - snowmobile scooter bike rider

It will test your nerves and take you to the extreme risky driving capabilities. This game will test your balance skills and reaction times beyond belief.

Features:
* Beautiful stunning 3 dimensional graphics * smooth and easy game play
* Environments that keeps changing
* Real life animations and physics
